intro: Hypoxis mollis, commonly known as the silver star, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asparagaceae and is characterized by its rosette of narrow, silver-gray leaves. The plant produces small, star-shaped yellow flowers during the summer months. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens. Hypoxis mollis is also valued for its ornamental appeal and ability to tolerate drought conditions.
